full_summary: **5P424-250392-B - Kootenay Firewood** # Request for Proposal **Solicitation Number:** WS4294495360 **Public Posting Date:** April 5, 2024 **Proposal Closing Date:** April 22, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST **Contract Value:** The estimated value of this procurement is not stated. **Location:** British Columbia ## Background The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the procurement of firewood for Parks Canada Agency (PC) in Kootenay, British Columbia. ## Scope of Work The successful contractor will be responsible for supplying firewood to Parks Canada Agency (PC) for a period of approximately 11 months, from April 2024 to March 2025. ## Proposal Criteria * The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price. * A mandatory site visit and capacity assessment may be conducted as part of the evaluation process. ## Terms and Conditions * The contract will be awarded based on the evaluation of compliant proposals. * The procurement is subject to the provisions of the Trade Agreement and the applicable laws and regulations of the Government of Canada. ## Tender Process Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Ariba discovery portal at before the proposal closing date and time. Proposals received after the scheduled closing time will not be accepted. ## Contact Information For further information regarding this Request for Proposal, please contact Samantha Phelan at samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ## Clarifications and Addenda Any questions or concerns about this Request for Proposal must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at the email address provided above. The Contracting Authority will provide responses to all questions and concerns in writing. No responses will be given in person or over the phone.
